name: Defend it Bee
description:
This is a submission for this #OneGameAWeek.

First of all, I'm not an artist and I couldnt draw anything decent in a while, but in this submission I wanted to challenge myself,

In this game you will have to use pollen as a resource to generate new bees that collect more pollen or defend the honeycomb.
Use the pollen carefully, because if you run out of it, your honeycomb will perish

Esta es una entrega para el reto semanal: #OneGameAWeek

En este juego tendrás que utilizar el polen como recurso para generar nuevas abejas que recojan más polen o defiendan el panal.
Usa el polen con cuidado, pues si te quedas sin el, tu panal perecerá
